short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Gimy (DPlayer) Viewing Progress & Skip Intros

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features for Gimy:
1️⃣ Progress Tracking: Save your viewing progress and resume from where you left off next time.  
2️⃣ Watchlist: Quickly find the shows you're currently watching.  
3️⃣ AI Recommendations: Get personalized suggestions based on what you've watched.  
4️⃣ Skip Intro: Automatically fast-forward 1:30 to skip most of the intro.

【中文說明】
擴充「劇迷」功能：
1️⃣ 紀錄進度：背景紀錄觀看進度，從中斷處繼續看。
2️⃣ 影片清單：以時間排序，列出目前在追的劇。
3️⃣ AI 推薦：根據看過的影片，推薦可能會有興趣的其他影片。
4️⃣ 跳過片頭：自動快轉 1:30，跳過大部分影片片頭。

⚠️ This extension is designed to enhance DPlayer functionality. Please avoid watching unlicensed content.（此擴充功能針對 DPlayer 功能優化，請勿觀看無版權影片。）
